comment: Fruity. SmokySmoky, very smooth,  working in chest and head
Very heavy smoke but with slight spicy finish. 4.1/5
Small amounts of peat and a nice lingering spice
lovely caol ila earthiness and good smoke. introduces an interesting sweetness to a classic
2004, 12 years old. Exceptional balance between herbal and sweet. Very enjoyable.
2004 vintage.  Part of drinks by the dram’s 2018 Advent Calendar.
